financial.title: Tools
financial.description: Calculate position sizes, risk management, and profit targets

info.title: Tools
info.description: Our comprehensive suite of financial tools helps you make informed trading decisions with precision:
features: Calculate optimal position sizes based on your account size and risk tolerance
Determine exact stop-loss and take-profit levels using our pip calculator
Analyze potential profit/loss scenarios with real-time calculations
Monitor risk-to-reward ratios as you adjust your trading parameters
Track drawdown and manage risk effectively
Calculate breakeven points for complex multi-position strategies

messages.incompleteInfo: Please fill in all required fields
messages.missingFields: Please fill in account size, entry price, and stop loss
messages.missingValues: Please enter both peak and current values
messages.breakEvenInfo: Breakeven calculation includes entry costs and fees for all positions. Exit fees are also factored in.
messages.shortBreakEvenInfo: For short positions, the breakeven is the price at which you need to buy back to neither profit nor lose, including all fees.
messages.drawdownInfo: Drawdown measures the decline from a peak to a trough in an investment's value. It indicates potential risk and volatility.

calculator.title: Basic Calculator
calculator.description: Simple calculations for quick trading decisions

info.title: Calculator
info.description: A powerful yet simple calculator designed specifically for traders:
features: Perform quick arithmetic operations with a trading-focused interface
Calculate percentage changes and price movements instantly
Use decimal precision for accurate trading calculations
Clear function to start new calculations without losing your train of thought
Keyboard shortcuts for efficient operation
Dark mode support for comfortable use in any environment

info.title: Markets
info.description: Stay ahead of the market with our comprehensive market overview:
features: Monitor real-time price movements across major cryptocurrency exchanges
Compare trading volumes and market depth for informed decisions
Track 24-hour price changes and identify market trends
View funding rates for perpetual futures markets
Save favorite pairs for quick access
Toggle auto-refresh to stay updated with market movements
Sort and filter markets by various metrics

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Keep track of your trading ideas and strategies

info.title: Notes
info.description: Your personal trading journal and strategy notebook:
features: Create and organize trading notes with customizable categories
Use pre-made templates for trade setup, analysis, and review
Quick-add notes with the floating action button
Export your notes as text files for backup or analysis
Auto-save functionality to never lose your thoughts
Track last update times for each note
Search and filter notes for easy access

rules.title: Rules
rules.emptyRuleError: Please enter a rule before adding

info.title: Rules
info.description: Maintain your trading discipline with our comprehensive rule management system:
features: Create and manage your personal trading rules checklist
Check off each rule before entering a trade
Add custom rules specific to your trading strategy
Get visual confirmation when all rules are checked
Rules persist between sessions to maintain consistency
Categorize rules by trading style or market conditions
Track rule compliance over time

about.title: About
about.description: finqtool is a trading tools extension for cryptocurrency traders. Built by finqt.
